name: Black Firmament
description:
Take control of the fleet! An epic space battle at mini pixel art scale. 

Play solo or coop against the CPU, or challenge another local player head to head.

Carriers launch Fighters, Bombers, and Drones, each with special powers and maneuverability. Bring down the enemy carrier's shields and take it out to win.

Supports game controller, keyboard, or touch screen. Press P or the Start button to pause, change controls, or reset.
